com.attributestudios.api.util

Class ConfigurationLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.attributestudios.api.util.ConfigurationLoader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Localizer

    public class ConfigurationLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Constructs a hash map of name / value pairs that represents the contents of a specified ".properties"- formatted file.
    Properties File Specification

    The configuration file is a "UTF-8 w/o BOM"-encoded file that follows simple name / value pair formatting as follows:

    [unlocalized-name]=[localized-name]

    Lines that should not be read (comments) are designated by ';' or '#' at the beginning of the line. Note that comments may not appear on the same line as a name / value pair. '\' is used to escape special characters. Lines should be delimited by CR/LF (windows) line endings.
    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Bridger Maskrey
    See Also:
    A subclass ConfigurationLoader that specializes in localization.
    Date:
    2014-08-13
    Latest Edit:
    2014-08-26

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> dictionary
      The translation map containing the name to value definitions of the loaded configuration file.
      private static java.lang.String escapedCharacters
      Represents a list of characters that may be escaped with '\' in the language file.
      protected java.io.InputStream fileStream
      The input stream from which to read in the configuration data.
      protected java.util.logging.Logger genericLogger
      The main debug logger for a configuration loader.
      protected boolean initialized
      Used to determine whether or not the configuration file was successfully loaded.
      private static java.lang.String replaceCharacters
      Represents a list of characters that will replace the escaped characters obtained form the localization file.

    • Field Detail

      • escapedCharacters

        private static final java.lang.String escapedCharacters
        Represents a list of characters that may be escaped with '\' in the language file. This list corresponds to the replaceCharacters string in such a way that the indexes of the allowed and replacement characters is equal.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • replaceCharacters

        private static final java.lang.String replaceCharacters
        Represents a list of characters that will replace the escaped characters obtained form the localization file. This list corresponds to the escapedCharacters string in such a way that the indexes of allowed and replacement characters is equal.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • fileStream

        protected java.io.InputStream fileStream
        The input stream from which to read in the configuration data.

      • dictionary

        protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> dictionary
        The translation map containing the name to value definitions of the loaded configuration file.

      • initialized

        protected boolean initialized
        Used to determine whether or not the configuration file was successfully loaded.

      • genericLogger

        protected java.util.logging.Logger genericLogger
        The main debug logger for a configuration loader. Any errors thrown by the loader or any output it this class writes is piped through this logger.

      • ConfigurationLoader

        public ConfigurationLoader(java.io.InputStream fileStream)
        Constructs a new ConfigurationLoader. The loader will read in tags constructed from the data obtained from the specified file stream.
        Parameters:
        fileStream - The stream from which to read the input properties file.

      • getValue

        public java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String objectKey,
                        java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Returns a string value as it is defined by the configuration dictionary.
        Parameters:
        objectKey - The key to translate.
        defaultValue - The default value to return if the translation fails.
        Returns:
        If successful, the translated value of the key is returned. If unsuccessful, the given default value is returned.
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Function to get a byte value, Function to get a double presicion number value., Function to get a floating point number value., Function to get an integer value., Function to get a long value., Function to get a short value.

      • getValue

        public long getValue(java.lang.String objectKey,
            long defaultValue)
        Returns a long value as defined by the configuration dictionary.
        Parameters:
        objectKey - The key to translate.
        defaultValue - The default long value of the key. If the translation or conversion of the objectKey fails, this value is returned.
        Returns:
        If successful, the translated and converted value of the key is returned. If unsuccessful, the default value is returned.
        Since:
        1.1.0
        See Also:
        Function to get a byte value, Function to get a double presicion number value., Function to get a floating point number value., Function to get an integer value., Function to get a short value., Function to get a string value.
